Just had an idea, which i do not think has ever been done. Was wondering what others thought of it.

I was just starting my Minmus mining project, and came across a problem. Empty fuel tanks are light, but extremely large and unwieldy. What about the ability to attach empty tanks, that are folded away into small compact packages, that you deploy in orbit?

Maybe you need inflatable logistic modules from UKS
